data.text: @Robber_Baron_ @AmyJacobson @kylamb8 When a speeding train is headed the way of @AmyJacobson and @DanProft they ignore it and claim its liberal propaganda. https://t.co/NLK8eZ3VBq
@Robber_Baron_ @kylamb8 There are many other consequences yet to come from keeping exercise and socialization out of everyone's daily life.
@Robber_Baron_ @kylamb8 nice try: not even false equivalence,,just a somewhat vague shot in the dark at reasonable measures that did not contribute to the severity of the illness
@Robber_Baron_ @kylamb8 Also good idea to ban unvaccinated people from gyms and fitness centers
@Bigsmiffy438 @Robber_Baron_ @kylamb8 Guarantee you are out of shape and overweight. Please don’t chime in on weight loss.

@TrottinTom @Robber_Baron_ @AmyJacobson @kylamb8 You’re serious?

You can’t be that dim.
